title: (x) "Vid himlens utkant" movie poster - Compacta {Yves}
content:
Hey!

Any idea on the movie poster “Vid himlens utkant” sans serif type?

Thanks in advance,

Seb

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115104611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/vidhimlensutkant_5700.jpg)

 [‹ PKO Bank Polski heavy grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115104611/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39097 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Books of Lasting Value italic serif face - Artcraft {Alessandro S} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080115104611/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39106 "Go to next forum topic")
author: all about seb

comments.content: Once again, thanks Yves. Never paid much attention to it before, but its italic certainly looks nice on this poster.
